text: William Norris, Founder of the Norris Locomotive Works William Norris (July 2, 1802 - January 5, 1867) was an American steam locomotive builder. He founded the Norris Locomotive Works and through this company pioneered the use of the 4-2-0 (the Norris type) locomotive type in America during the 1840s. ==References== * American locomotive engineers. Retrieved February 9, 2005. title: William Norris (locomotive builder)
